content: Is there a way to rearrange the sequence of columns in Forge's grid view?

@Simone Heckmann no, the column order is currently hardcoded. However it's certainly possible to implement column order configuration. I'll write down your suggestion as a feature request. But this won't be ready for the next release.
Sure Thanks! I was wondering if I'm just missing it :)
Grid View could use some more love, but frankly I don't get a lot of feedback on it. If this is popular functionality, then we could invest some more time in this part of the UI.
I don't have a solid use case for this requirement either... I was just playing around with aliases and they happen to be at the far end of the grid...

Yes, the grid view is still a bit primitive. Also I omitted some complex element properties, e.g. Mappings. You can only edit these properties via the treeview control. Anyway, feel free to submit feature requests! We try to manage our roadmap based on popular demand ;p
